tool_description: Official GraphQL API for dropmail.me temporary 10 minute email service (temp mail). https://dropmail.me/api/schema.graphql
name: DropMail
title: DropMail

api_list.name: GraphQL
api_list.description:
All the requests are executed via single endpoint.

For the quickstart, try `mutation{introduceSession{id, addresses{address}}}` mutation. It will create a new server-side email storage with `id` and single email address attached to it. Then use `query session(id: "..sessionId..") {mails{text, headerSubject}}` query to read incoming mail.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dropmail.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dropmail.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dropmail.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dropmail.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
